name: 06 - Creating cluster on Customer Data Using K-means
parameters: --var storeId=600 --var Calender=105 --var instoreDiscount=1,0 --var campaignCouponDiscount=1,0 --var manufacturerCouponDiscount=0,1 --var campaignCouponRedemptions=1,0 --var campaignCouponRedemptionsOnPrivateLabels=1,0 --var manufactureCouponRedemptions=1,0 --var instoreDiscountApplied=1,0 --var campaignTargetedInstoreDiscountApplied=1,0 --var privateLabelInstoreDiscountApplied=1,0 --var campaignCouponRedemptionInstoreDiscountApplied=1,0 --var campaignCouponRedemptionPrivateLabelInstoreDiscountApplied=1,0 --var manufCouponRedemptionInstoreDiscountApplied=1,0

fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. fields.name: height
fields.title: Height
fields.description: Height of note

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
The steps being executed in this workflow are:

  1. Standardizing all the features
  2. vectorizing the feature
  3. Creating the clusters with the help of the k mean algorithm
  4. Predicting the cluster for each customer
  5. Saving the final out in CSV format
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Comments for the Workflow

fields.name: conditionExpr
fields.value:
pdates_campaign_coupon_redemptions_status in(${campaignCouponRedemptions}) and
pdates_campaign_coupon_redemptions_on_private_labels_status in(${campaignCouponRedemptionsOnPrivateLabels}) and
pdates_manuf_coupon_redemptions_status in(${manufactureCouponRedemptions}) and
pdates_instore_discount_applied_status in(${instoreDiscountApplied}) and
pdates_campaign_targeted_instore_discount_applied_status in(${campaignTargetedInstoreDiscountApplied}) and
pdates_private_label_instore_discount_applied_status in(${privateLabelInstoreDiscountApplied}) and
pdates_campaign_coupon_redemption_instore_discount_applied_status in(${campaignCouponRedemptionInstoreDiscountApplied}) and
pdates_campaign_coupon_redemption_private_label_instore_discount_applied_status in(${campaignCouponRedemptionPrivateLabelInstoreDiscountApplied}) and
pdates_manuf_coupon_redemption_instore_discount_applied_status in(${manufCouponRedemptionInstoreDiscountApplied})
fields.title: Conditional Expression
fields.description: The filtering condition. Rows not satisfying given condition will be excluded from output DataFrame. eg: usd_pledged_real > 0 and (category = 1 or category == 2) and goal > 100
